p: Based on the review, Ageratum conyzoides L. has a great deal of potency and clinical effect which is beneficial. Further efforts should be continued to decide the toxicity and adverse side effect of this herbal extract in the clinical study because there have not studied the specific toxicity as well as its adverse side effect. To date, there has not been much development in the formulation of this herb by using more advanced technology which can increase the economic value of this plant. Therefore, this could be a good innovation in the development of dosage form formulation utilizing Ageratum conyzoides L.
